alert.note: Alert for Clark; Dallas; Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 1:00AM CDT until June 18 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Pike County in southwestern Arkansas... Western Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 100 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Beirne, or 8 miles northeast of Prescott, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gurdon... Sparkman... Okolona... Whelen Springs... Beirne... Richwoods... Gum Springs in Clark County... Burtsell... Curtis... Manning... Ouachita... Holly Springs... Vaden... Pine Grove... Dalark... Griffithtown... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
